Update!! I had to move our reservation time up 30 min. to 2:30PM. This is to ensure that we get the special prefix lunch price. Late arrivals are permitted but it will be just a reg. bar menu only after 3PM.

2:30 PM Table Seating is in the bar area just inside the front entrance.
Please arrive by 2:25pm. I have reserved two tables 6 people each(max reserved in my name). Please call me by noon if you are running late or can't make it. Add ons are permitted to sit at the bar so friends are permitted to join us for cocktails and a bar menu.

RESTAURANT WEEK SPECIAL: 3 Course PreFix menu for only 20 bucks!!(add 26.5% for tax and tip...so $25 bucks plus beverages) I have selected March 21st as For "Fun with Alcohol" Members!!! Enjoy this "Restaurant Week" special without having to battle crowds in Davis Square.

Please rsvp "yes" for this meetup. Sorry, no "Maybe" because I will need an exact head count.color]


Optional: At 1:30, I will arrive in Davis square to poke around in the second hand shops on Elm St. If you care to join me, meet me inside Gargoyles ( I will be sitting in the lounge seating area just inside the front entrance.) and we can go from there. Rain or shine so dress for the weather. My cell number is 617-233-5927 if you come later and wish to find me along Elm Street shopping. I will be back to Gargoyles for our lunch by 2:20pm.

Casual dress. I will be wearing a black jacket with "bright colors of springtime" artsy pattern splashed all over it and jeans.

Try Lauren's NEW Favorite cocktail, "My Backyard" which was created by one of the bartenders, paul. I 've asked him to make a cockatil which is less sweet than most cocktails and has subtle "summertime " flavors such as St Germaine, lime and perirere water with cuccumbers as a garnish! Yummy!!! Thank you paul..hits the spot on a warm sunny day!!

item.name: LUNCH SPECIAL@ GARGOYLES (Davis)
